title: Chat
shortDescription: Live support through Messenger straight from your website.
longDescription:
POWr Chat is the convenient and easy way to chat with your site visitors in real time from your website. There are no complex integrations, all you need is your website and your Facebook Page for your business.
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Chat?   

* **Boost conversions** - Easily let customers reach you in real time through Facebook Messenger to answer questions, remove blocks and make more sales.
* **Stay ahead of the competition** - Only 54% of retailers offer live chat on their website. Stay ahead and provide enhanced customer service with a customized chat experience.
* **Make it yours** - Customize it with your own colors, fonts, icon, welcome message and more. Decide which customers see it and what they see if you’re away.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Connect to any Facebook Page from your website and chat through Facebook Messenger.
* Customize your chat header, description and automated welcome message.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* * More personalization with custom images, chat icons and backgrounds.
* Chat trigger control: choose which users see it, the frequency and delays.
* Away message for when you can’t immediately respond.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=chat).

# Why users love Chat:   

“Pretty awesome! Simple, to the point, clean and reliable.”

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Chat up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (https://www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
author: POWr Inc

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.
